channel.title: Game Crash
channel.description: Happened in the power silo? Uh..Oh yeah. I was running through a hallway after turning the power on the rocket. (To kill the big three armed bug). Can't remember exactly what it said, something about not loading something and some big number. Anyways, the bug report is attached. Back to BM! hl2_4104_crash_2012_9_15T8_10_13C0.mdmp (100 KB)

item.title: Game Crash
item.dc:creator: UnEspion
item.description:
Happened in the power silo? Uh…Oh yeah. I was running through a hallway after turning the power on the rocket. (To kill the big three armed bug).
Can’t remember exactly what it said, something about not loading something and some big number. Anyways, the bug report is attached.

Back to BM!
